name: Commanager Tycoon
description: Grow up your business in Commanager. With a whole new way for managing, Commanager bring for player the experience of having their own stores, hire, fire , replenish stock and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
